welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lakewood Ranch, where the charm of small-town America meets modern conveniences. Get ready to experience our beautiful parks, exciting events, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that our vibrant community has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport primarily serves international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Venice Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Venice Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whitted Airport houses all commercial flights and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Whitted Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.
